languages.text: "Значит, ты правда веришь, что твой бог сидит где-то на троне из золота и приглядывает за тобой?"
"You really believe your god is sitting somewhere on a throne of gold, watching over you?"
languages.original_text: "Значит, ты правда веришь, что твой бог сидит где-то на троне из золота и приглядывает за тобой?"

traits.locale_text: "So you really believe your god is sitting somewhere on a throne of gold, watching over you?"
"So you really believe your god is sitting somewhere on a throne of gold, watching over you?"
"So you really believe your god is sitting somewhere on a throne of gold, watching over you?"
"So you really believe your god is sitting somewhere on a throne of gold, watching over you?"

languages.text: “你是真的相信你们的神明正坐在不知位于何处的黄金王座之上，注视着你？”
languages.original_text: "You really believe your god is sitting somewhere on a throne of gold, watching over you?"

traits.locale_text: “所以，你是真的相信你们的神明正坐在不知位于何处的黄金王座之上，注视着你？”
“所以，你是真的相信你们的神明正坐在不知位于何处的黄金王座之上，注视着你？”

languages.text: « Vous croyez vraiment que votre dieu vous regarde depuis son trône d'or, quelque part ? »
languages.original_text: "You really believe your god is sitting somewhere on a throne of gold, watching over you?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous croyez vraiment que votre dieu vous regarde depuis son trône d'or, quelque part ? »

languages.text: "Ihr glaubt also wirklich, dass Euer Gott irgendwo auf einem Thron aus Gold sitzt und über Euch wacht?"
languages.original_text: "You really believe your god is sitting somewhere on a throne of gold, watching over you?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr glaubt also wirklich, dass Euer Gott irgendwo auf einem Thron aus Gold sitzt und über Euch wacht?"
"Ihr glaubt also wirklich, dass Euer Gott irgendwo auf einem Thron aus Gold sitzt und über Euch wacht?"

languages.text: 「なら、あなたがたは、神がどこかで金の玉座に座って見守ってくれていると本当に信じているの？」
languages.original_text: "You really believe your god is sitting somewhere on a throne of gold, watching over you?"

traits.locale_text: 「なら、あなたがたは、神がどこかで金の玉座に座って見守ってくれていると本当に信じているの？」
「なら、あなたがたは、神がどこかで金の玉座に座って見守ってくれていると本当に信じているの？」

languages.text: «¿De verdad crees que tu dios está sentado en un trono de oro, velando por ti?».
languages.original_text: "You really believe your god is sitting somewhere on a throne of gold, watching over you?"

traits.locale_text: «Entonces, ¿de verdad crees que tu dios está sentado en un trono de oro, velando por ti?».

languages.original_text: "So you really believe your god is sitting somewhere on a throne of gold, watching over you?"

languages.text: "Gerçekten tanrının altından yapılma bir tahtta oturup seni kolladığına mı inanıyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "You really believe your god is sitting somewhere on a throne of gold, watching over you?"

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten tanrının altından yapılma bir tahtta oturup seni kolladığına mı inanıyorsun?"
